entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 07:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -41.3°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 32. POP 30%
